title.en: Like Wind on a Dry Branch

altTitles.en: Like the Wind on a Dry Branch
Like a Dry Branch in the Wind
Like a Wind on a Dry Branch

altTitles.de: Wie ein welker Ast im Winde

altTitles.fr: Comme le vent sur une branche sèche

altTitles.es: El viento que mece las ramas
Como el viento en una rama seca

altTitles.fa: همانند باد بر شاخه ای خشک؟

altTitles.th: ราวลมพัดกิ่งไม้แห้ง

description.de:
Die Pest hat Rieta Tristi ihren Ehemann genommen, Sklavenhändler haben ihr Kind entführt, und jetzt will ein boshafter Adeliger sie als seine Grabbeigabe lebendig begraben lassen. Während Rieta sich in Lebensgefahr befindet, taucht plötzlich der berüchtigte Großherzog von Axias auf. Wird er Rieta aus ihrer Misere befreien?

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5489043), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=748535&weekday=wed)

description.en:
Count Casarius fell victim to a plague and died suddenly, leaving behind a will stating that Rietta, a beautiful young widow of the manor, whom he tried to use as a concubine, be buried alive alongside him. Just before Rietta is buried, Archduke Axias, rumored to be a cruel tyrant, arrives at the funeral to collect the enormous debt Count Casarius still owes him.

"Everyone here seems to feel sorry for her, and I still have a debt to collect from Casarius… If I take her instead, I think all of you here should be happy," he smiled, "Hello, my temptress."

---
As plague and turmoil afflicts the empire, enchanting widow Rieta Tristi finds herself at the mercy of a malicious nobleman and his dying wish to have her buried alive beside his corpse. The plague has taken her husband, slave traders have taken her young child, and now her own life is at risk -- until an unexpected visit from the empire's outcast prince changes everything.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5489043), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=748535&weekday=wed)

description.es:
En un imperio azotado por la plaga y turbado por intrigas políticas, Rieta Tristi lo ha perdido todo: la peste se llevó a su marido y los comerciantes de esclavos se llevaron a su hija. Viuda, se ve obligada a unirse a un noble cruel y mucho mayor que ella que fallece poco después y exige como último deseo que la entierren viva junto a su cuerpo. Parece no haber esperanzas para Rieta... Pero una oportuna visita del príncipe rebelde lo cambiará todo.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

کنت کازاریوس وصیت کرده بود معشوقه اش ریتا را زنده زنده با او بسوزانند. قبل از سوزاندن ریتا ناگهان سر و کله ی دوک آکسیاس که به ظالم ترین دوک معروف بود پیدا شد .....وقتی با این صحنه مواجه شد

description.fr:
Alors que la peste et la tourmente affligent l'empire, la veuve enchanteresse Rietta Tristi se retrouve à la merci d'un noble malveillant et il demanda avant sa mort de la faire enterrer vivante à côté de son cadavre. La peste a pris son mari, les marchands d'esclaves ont pris son jeune enfant, et maintenant sa propre vie est en danger - jusqu'à ce qu'une visite inattendue du prince exclu de l'empire change tout.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

description.id:
"Hai, wanita rendahan." Rieta yang direncanakan untuk menjadi persembahan hidup, diselamatkan oleh Grand Duke Axias. Lalu, bagaimana dengan kelanjutan nasib wanita ini...?!

---

description.ko:
남편을 잃고, 아이를 빼앗기고, 이제 생매장을 눈 앞에 둔 과부 리에타. 
그 곳에 ‘미친 폐황자’로 불리는 저주받은 땅, 악시아스 성의 대공. 킬리언이 나타났다.
그녀를 데려가겠다고 말하는 킬리언이 인사를 건넨다. “안녕, 요부”

빚 대신 저 여자를 데려가지... 폐황자가 말했다.  “안녕, 요부” 

---
힘없는 평민 여인에게 아름다운 외모는 축복이기보단 저주였다. 
남편을 잃고, 아이를 빼앗기고, 이제 생매장을 눈 앞에 둔 과부 리에타.  
그 곳에 ‘미친 폐황자’로 불리는 저주받은 땅, 악시아스 성의 대공. 킬리언이 나타났다. 
그녀를 데려가겠다고 말하는 킬리언이 인사를 건낸다. 
“안녕, 요부”

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

description.pt:
Depois de perder o marido e ter seu filho levado embora, ela tem que ser enterrada viva. O arquiduque Axias, conhecido como o “príncipe psicótico” na terra amaldiçoada, aparece em Kirion, afirmando que vai levá-la com ele.

---

description.th:
ลีเอตต้า ทริสตี้ เป็นหญิงหม้ายที่เสียสามี ถูกแย่งลูก และใกล้จะถูกฝังทั้งเป็นพร้อมกับศพของเอิร์ลคาซาเรียส แต่ในงานศพของคาซาเรียสแขกที่ไม่ได้เชิญอย่างแกรนด์ดยุกแอกเซียสผู้มีฉายาว่าเจ้าชายเสียสติปรากฏตัวมาช่วยชีวิตลีเอตต้า “ว่าไง นางยั่วสวาท”

---

description.tr:
“Hey, sen.” Kont Casarius, bir vebanın kurbanı oldu ve aniden öldü ve arkasında hizmetkar olarak kullanmaya çalıştığı güzel genç dul eşi Rietta’nın yanına diri diri gömüleceğini belirten bir vasiyet bıraktı. Rietta gömülmeden hemen önce, acımasız bir zorba olduğu söylenen Arşidük Axias, Kont Casarius’un hala kendisine borçlu olduğu için, muazzam borcu toplamak için cenazeye geldi. “Buradaki herkes onun için üzülüyormuş gibi görünüyor ve hala Casarius’tan tahsil etmem gereken bir borcum var… Borç yerine onu alırsam, buradaki herkesin mutlu olacağını düşünüyorum” diye gülümsedi. “Merhaba, ayartıcım.”

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5489043), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=748535&weekday=wed)

description.vi:
Bá tước Casarius trở thành nạn nhân của một bệnh dịch và đột ngột qua đời, để lại di chúc ghi rằng Rietta, góa phụ trẻ xinh đẹp của trang viên, người mà ông đã cố gắng lấy làm vợ lẽ, được chôn sống cùng với ông. Ngay trước khi Rietta được chôn cất, Đại công tước Axias, được đồn đại là một bạo chúa tàn ác, đã đến đám tang để thu khoản nợ khổng lồ mà bá tước Casarius vẫn còn nợ anh ta.

---

description.zh:
嗜血冷酷的帝国皇子殿下，
爱上秀色可餐的悲情女子。

曾有着幸福家庭的黎艾莎·特莉丝蒂，痛失丈夫和孩子之后，被无良伯爵纠缠，甚至面临殉葬绝境。就在这一刻，废皇子阿克斯出现救下黎艾莎。微风吹拂枯枝，逆光下，他痞痞地笑道“还挺漂亮的”……

---

description.zh-hk:
染上瘟疫而死的伯爵在遺言中提到要莉艾塔活人陪葬，在此之際被廢黜的皇子救下了她，並帶她離開領地。到異地展開新生活的她和殘暴又冷漠的廢皇子，該如何走近彼此，攜手迎來光明呢？

---
